abstract: The Tank Gang learn about standing up for each other and being good friends. 'Screen It' 2013 Winner - Bullying. No Way! Primary Award.
description: This is the story of the Tank Gang. The Tank Gang love playing together, even with Jack, the bully. One day, Jack goes too far and the Tank Gang see how putting up with Jack has meant that their friend got hurt. The friends all learn the importance of standing up for each other, not bullying and being good friends.
